page.title: 19The School Pond
page.content:
The school pond at the beginning of the Summer of 1985 was a mass of water lilies and very little else. It was decided by the Biology Department to clear it out and put 30 fresh water fish , a frog ,some new water weeds in. This was done during the last few weeks of term by a group of fourth year boys. Altogether some 30 to 40 bags of waste was removed from the pond. It will be interesting to see how the pond has flourished in a few years time.
A future development to the pond.
It is hoped to be able to build a fountain in the next few years.
